thread.title: DRUNK WOMAN STEALS LORRY, CAUSES HUGE MESS IN ORCHARD

author: farhan
title: DRUNK WOMAN STEALS LORRY, CAUSES HUGE MESS IN ORCHARD
text:
DRUNK WOMAN STEALS LORRY, CAUSES HUGE MESS IN ORCHARD   
A reader shared this post with us. Advertisement 
"This morning incident ... 
Drunk girl took uncle's lorry for a joy ride from orchard tower. Hit my bus, the taxis and a few cars along the way. Poor uncle chasing with trolley along orchard road, luckily managed to pick him up and track down the drunk girl who drove off his lorry. 
Drinks all toppled because of the sharp turning. 
Engaged wrong gear reversed and hit the car behind. 
What a morning the poor uncle had, may god bless him."
